FuncDef:
The locality command configures a locality name for a PKI entity.
The undo locality command cancels the configuration. The locality command configures a locality name for a PKI entity. The undo locality command cancels the configuration. By default, a PKI entity does not have a locality name.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the locality name of an entity.
It is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, including letters, numerals, apostrophes ('), equal signs (=), parentheses (), plus signs (+), commas (,), minus signs (-), periods (.), slashes (/), colons (:), and spaces.
